algorithms.name: Quadratic Time
algorithms.description: Performance degrades quickly with larger inputs. Example: nested loops

algorithms.name: Linearithmic Time
algorithms.description: Common in efficient sorting algorithms like merge sort or heap sort.

algorithms.name: Linear Time
algorithms.description: Operation count grows directly with input size. Example: simple for loop

algorithms.name: Constant Time
algorithms.description: Operation count does not depend on input. Example: accessing an element of an array
